评论概述: Oversized is a matter of opinion.
评论详情: If this sweatshirt is oversized, it may be in width, definitely not length. The sweatshirt only goes to about mid hip. I consider an oversize sweatshirt to be below hip level. As for width, the body width is comfortable, but not over large. The shoulder seams are further apart than normal fit, but that may be to make the shirt appear more oversized than it actually is. This isn't a thin shirt, but it is pretty lightweight. That may be because it is only 50% cotton. The graphics are embroidered to the shirt, you can see on the inside that the stitching goes through. This seems to be a good quality sweatshirt for the price. It has a crew neck with elasticized cuffs and hem. Good solid color. Great graphics.
I washed it and it shrank, very disappointed!
Good quality and doesn’t shrink when washed/dried. It fits oversized, and material is very soft. It’s so comfortable for a cool day with tights!

With the cooler weather coming I always look for a cozy sweatshirt to wear! LOMON Oversized Sweatshirt meets all of my criteria and then some. It is durable and so soft and comfy! The ribbing on the cuffs and waist are as you would expect in a quality sweatshirt. I would say it is if medium weight and not overly thick. It is oversized, which makes it perfect for over jeans and boots for fall! The lettering is actual embroidery, as opposed to an applique and it's done very well! This sweatshirt washes well without any shrinkage to speak of. If anything washing just makes it that much cozier! I can safely say that this is far better than some of the other sweatshirts that I have purchased from Amazon. It's a good choice when looking for a nice sweatshirt!

I ordered this for my 13yo daughter. I did order it a size up so it would be baggy and roomy for her over leggings and bike short. She says it is super cute and comfy she says. It's not a super heavy sweatshirt so it's really nice for spring/fall. You may want to layer up on much cooler days. But really cute! Already worn and washed several times. Didn't shrink at all. She loves it so I am happy.

It will go with almost anything you want to wear. This is a nice sweatshirt and I do recommend it to others.

Overall we are pleased with this item.
